entries.title: GOP Lawmaker Called Out by Gay Nephew for Anti-LGBTQ Speech: 'Not Right'
entries.description: "So despite coming out to my aunt...I guess she's still just as much as a homophobe," said Andrew Hartzler, Representative Vicky Hartzler's nephew.

entries.title: James Cameron Says He Has 'No Interest' in Making a Comic Book Film
entries.description: The director also said he feels the visual effects for his coming "Avatar" sequel are better than Marvel film's effects, and it's "not even close."

entries.title: Ginni Thomas Would Be Shielded by Bill Most House Democrats Voted for
entries.description: The addresses, phone numbers and work relationships of Supreme Court justices would effectively become state secrets.

entries.title: Russian Agent Compares Griner Deal to 'Godfather': 'Offer You Can't Refuse'
entries.description: WNBA player Brittney Griner was freed from imprisonment in Russia on Thursday after the U.S. agreed to exchange her for a notorious Russian arms dealer.

entries.title: Trump Blasts Jewish Leaders for 'Lack of Loyalty' After Fuentes Dinner
entries.description: "How quickly Jewish Leaders forgot that I was the best, by far, President for Israel," the former president wrote Friday on Truth Social.

entries.title: AOC 'Grateful' Sinema Switches to Independent, Hints Progressive Challenge
entries.description: Several left-wing organizations have already urged progressive Congressman Ruben Gallego to challenge Sinema in 2024.

entries.title: DOJ Will 'Have to Act' Against Trump After 1/6 Criminal Referral: Kirschner
entries.description: When asked if he sees any scenarios where Donald Trump is not named in the criminal referrals, former federal prosecutor Glenn Kirschner said, "No, none, zero."
